heading: HR01997
0: A RESOLUTION DIRECTING THE APPROPRIATE HOUSE COMMITTEE TO INVESTIGATE, IN AID OF LEGISLATION, THE COLLAPSE OF THE 95-METER SEGMENT OF THE 300-METER FLOOD CONTROL STRUCTURE IN SAN SIMON, PAMPANGA IN ORDER TO IDENTIFY THE TRUE CAUSE OF ITS COLLAPSE AS WELL AS TO DETERMINE THE ACCOUNTABILITIES OF THE PARTIES INVOLVED IN THE SAID PROJECT WHICH DEPRIVED THE RESIDENTS FROM TIMELY REALIZING THE POSITIVE GAINS THAT THE PROJECT AFFORDS THEM
status: Pending with the Committee on RULES since 2018-07-30
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HR01997
FULL TITLE : A RESOLUTION DIRECTING THE APPROPRIATE HOUSE COMMITTEE TO INVESTIGATE, IN AID OF LEGISLATION, THE COLLAPSE OF THE 95-METER SEGMENT OF THE 300-METER FLOOD CONTROL STRUCTURE IN SAN SIMON, PAMPANGA IN ORDER TO IDENTIFY THE TRUE CAUSE OF ITS COLLAPSE AS WELL AS TO DETERMINE THE ACCOUNTABILITIES OF THE PARTIES INVOLVED IN THE SAID PROJECT WHICH DEPRIVED THE RESIDENTS FROM TIMELY REALIZING THE POSITIVE GAINS THAT THE PROJECT AFFORDS THEM
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : ALEJANO, GARY C.
DATE FILED : 2018-07-11
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
REFERRAL TO THE COMMITTEE ON RULES ON 2018-07-30
